definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
Steve Jobs (1955-2011), US co-founder and CEO of Apple, Inc.
pinyin: Shi3 di4 fu1 · Qiao2 bu4 si1

sentences.english: Steve uncorked bottles of champagne to toast the achievement.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫打开几瓶香槟酒庆功。

sentences.english: Steve borrowed his dad's sports car to impress his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫借来他爸爸的跑车以讨得女友欢心。

sentences.english: She and her husband, Steve, ate meals with us.
sentences.chinese: 她和她的丈夫，史蒂夫和我们一起吃饭。

sentences.english: Melinda and Steve looked up fearfully when Veach walked in.
sentences.chinese: 维克走进屋时，梅林达和史蒂夫惊恐地抬起头来。

sentences.english: NASA followed Stevie’s progress with interest.
sentences.chinese: 国家航空总署饶有兴趣地追踪着史蒂夫此事的进展。
由史蒂夫前言“沃兹”沃兹涅克。

sentences.english: Steve had been meeting with the bankers in separate groups .
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫分头去和一批批的银行家会晤。

sentences.english: RIGHT now, Stevemadden.com has almost no online competition.
sentences.chinese: 目前史蒂夫马登网站几乎没有遇到网上竞争。

sentences.english: Hello, My name is Steve, I come from LuLiang.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我叫史蒂夫，我来自陆良。

sentences.english: Thank you, Steve, for showing us what can happen when you stay hungry.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你，史蒂夫，当你求知若饥时已经展现了这一切。

sentences.english: Steve wasted no time joining their merrymaking.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫立即就加入到他们的狂欢中。

sentences.english: I slept over at my friend Steve’s house.
sentences.chinese: 我夜宿在我的朋友史蒂夫的家。

sentences.english: Steve intended to go to the local newspaper .
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫打算到当地报馆去。

sentences.english: Because Steve Wynn can’t just eat.
sentences.chinese: 因为史蒂夫永利不可能只是吃。

sentences.english: Steve walked back to his desk, his heart pounding within his chest.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫回到自己的座位，心怦怦直跳。
